title: Westwood 2BR 2BA w/ Fireplace/Parking/Central Air+more
posting_body: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Apartment Home In Westwood.
This 2 bedroom offers the following amenities:

Westwood 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment located within walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks south of Wilshire and one block west of Westwood Boulevard, exactly where you want.
We're minutes away to all popular Westside destinations including Armand Hammer Museum of Art & Cultural Center, UCLA, Getty Museum, Geffen Playhouse, Wadsworth Theatre.
Fabulous restaurants and shopping, movie theatres, world class yoga, and public transportation are all at your fingertips.
Apartment features include wood/carpet flooring, central air/heat, a gas fireplace and a gourmet kitchen equipped with modern appliances.
Community features include soothing spa/hot tub, fitness center, roof terrace, bbq/grill area, you'll find easy living with endless comforts and conveniences here at The Park Rochester.
For questions or for appointment, call us today at
